      • saveImageToSD

        public static java.lang.String saveImageToSD(Bitmap bmp)
        Saves a bitmap to a location on the phone's sd card. Returns the path of where the image was saved to.

        CODE REUSE:
        This code was modified from the code at:

      • isPublishedStoryMyStory

        public static java.lang.Boolean isPublishedStoryMyStory(Story story,
                                        Context context)
        Returns if the publish story is the users.

        It does this by checking the phoneId of the story with the phone Id of the user
